divs: Sighting DetailsI had just watched the sun set when I noticed a light in the sky. I watched for a few minutes. At first I thought it was a contrail from a jet reflecting the sun, but it seemed to bright and the movement seemed to slow. It came from the direction of the sunset, but slightly north and traveled in a southerly direction. I could not determine what it was. At 8:34PM, I went in to the house and grabbed my iphone. I was able to obtain 13 pictures as it traveled through the sky until it disappeared at 8:40 PM. Just as it disappeared I noticed another object in the sky at 8:42 PM coming from the exact same location and traveling the identical path as the first. I was able to take 13 pictures before it disappeared at 8:43. It traveled a shorter distance before it disappeared out of sight. Both objects look similar in shape and size, traveled the same identical path and seemed to emit a red color (glow) from behind.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Soulsbyville
There were no other sightings in Soulsbyville on or around July 2nd 2012
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: 2 bright objects seen over the Sierra Nevada mountains at sunse on July 2 2012.
